#summary Gnome-Google-Agenda

= Introduction =

A simple application allows you to see your upcoming Google Calendar events on your Gnome desktop. <br>
Useful for students who always have assignments, projects and exams unexpectedly come up (see screenshots).

= Details =

Main project page: <a href="http://code.google.com/p/gnome-google-agenda/">here</a> <br>
Developers: viva.o.mauricio, stevenc49
